name: Amy
seeking: Seeks JV partners who can refer professional clients needing consulting or advisory support. Limited profile data suggests general openness to cross-referral with professionals in complementary business services.
what_you_do: Burnout coach and speaker who helps people break free from burnout through clarity, direction, and positive habits.
who_you_serve: People experiencing burnout, including corporate teams and individuals seeking work-life balance.
signature_programs: Beyond Burnout Framework, Life on MY Terms Podcast, My Journey To Happiness (eBook), Beyond Burnout Community
service_provided: 1:1 burnout coaching, group burnout coaching, corporate workshops, speaking engagements, podcast, author
social_proof: 4x Entrepreneur, Motivational Speaker, Author, Host of 'Life on MY Terms' Podcast
bio: Amy Mangueira is a 4x entrepreneur, burnout and self-care expert, coach, speaker, and author. She has 10+ years of experience in digital marketing and is a professor at Southern New Hampshire University. Her Beyond Burnout Framework has helped thousands transform their lives.
business_focus: Helping individuals and organizations break free from burnout through coaching, workshops, and speaking.
offering: Burnout coaching, interactive workshops, speaking engagements, and a proven burnout framework.
